author: p. Davies
content: it is most likely that these are copies – as it is this type of boat in which Commander Agar won the VC in the Baltic in 1919/20.

author: Rick Spilman
content: No. That is new to me. Thanks.

author: Ben
content: Of course you know about the British WWI MTB’s single step hulls which dropped the torpedo out of the stern like the Russians. Wonder if the Russians copied that concept? Turnabout is the Faulkner short story.
